title: Mariah Carey Details 2024 Christmas Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: Carey's annual Christmas outing kicks off in November. Learn how to get sold-out tickets here. Mariah Carey Details 2024 Christmas Tour: How to Get Tickets Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Mariah Carey has revealed tour dates for her 2024 Christmas tour, which takes place in November and December. Learn how to get sold-out tickets here.
text: Mariah Carey has revealed dates for her 2024 Christmas tour. Beginning November 6th, the Undisputed Queen of Christmas will embark on “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time,” a 20-city US jaunt that coincides with the 30th anniversary of her legendary holiday album, Merry Christmas. Get your seat here, and scroll below for more information on how to get tickets, including how to get access to sold-out shows. Get Mariah Carey Tickets Here Mariah Carey’s 2024 holiday tour is officially dubbed, “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time.” It spans a total of 20 shows, kicking off on November 6th in Highland, California, and runs through a December 17th concert in Brooklyn, New York. In between, Carey will visit cities including Los Angeles, Phoenix, Austin, Houston, Dallas, Atlanta, Nashville, Philadelphia, Boston, Baltimore, Raleigh, Pittsburgh, Newark, and more. Coinciding with the 30th anniversary of Carey’s legendary holiday album Merry Christmas and its record-breaking single “All I Want For Christmas Is You,” the tour’s setlist promises timeless holiday classics, fan-favorite chart-toppers, and an unforgettable festive experience. How Can I Get Sold Out Tickets or Discounted Tickets to Mariah Carey’s 2024 Christmas Tour? Once tickets to Mariah Carey’s Christmas tour go on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Are Mariah Carey’s 2024 Christmas Tour Dates? See the dates for “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time” tour below, and get tickets here. 11/06 – Highland, California @ Yaamava Theater 11/08 – Los Angeles, California @ Hollywood Bowl 11/13 – Greater Palm Springs, California @ Acrisure Arena 11/15 – Phoenix, Arizona @ Footprint Center 11/17 – Austin, Texas @ Moody Center 11/19 – Houston, Texas @ Toyota Center 11/21 – Dallas, Texas @ American Airlines Center 11/23 – Atlanta, Georgia @ State Farm Arena 11/25 – Nashville, Tennessee @ Bridgestone Arena 11/27 – Rosemont, Illinois @ Allstate Arena 11/29 – St. Louis, Missouri @ Enterprise Center 12/01 – Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena 12/03 – Philadelphia, Pennsylvania @ Wells Fargo Center 12/05 – Boston, Massachusetts @ TD Garden 12/07 – Baltimore, Maryland @ CFG Bank Arena 12/09 – Raleigh, North Carolina @ PNC Arena 12/11 – Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania @ PPG Paints Arena 12/13 – Newark, New Jersey @ Prudential Center 12/15 – Belmont Park, New York @ UBS Arena 12/17 – Brooklyn, New York @ Barclays Center Does Mariah Carey Have Any Other Upcoming Tour Dates? Mariah Carey recently added new dates to her Las Vegas residency, “The Celebration of Mimi Live in Las Vegas,” extending it into early 2025. A celebration of her 2005 album, The Emancipation of Mimi, the residency takes place at the Dolby Live at Park MGM from July 26th – August 10th, 2024, and January 31st – February 15th, 2025. Tickets can be purchased here.
html:
Mariah Carey has revealed dates for her 2024 Christmas tour. Beginning November 6th, the Undisputed Queen of Christmas will embark on “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time,” a 20-city US jaunt that coincides with the 30th anniversary of her legendary holiday album, Merry Christmas.

Get your seat here, and scroll below for more information on how to get tickets, including how to get access to sold-out shows.

Get Mariah Carey Tickets Here

Mariah Carey’s 2024 holiday tour is officially dubbed, “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time.” It spans a total of 20 shows, kicking off on November 6th in Highland, California, and runs through a December 17th concert in Brooklyn, New York.

In between, Carey will visit cities including Los Angeles, Phoenix, Austin, Houston, Dallas, Atlanta, Nashville, Philadelphia, Boston, Baltimore, Raleigh, Pittsburgh, Newark, and more.

Coinciding with the 30th anniversary of Carey’s legendary holiday album Merry Christmas and its record-breaking single “All I Want For Christmas Is You,” the tour’s setlist promises timeless holiday classics, fan-favorite chart-toppers, and an unforgettable festive experience.

How Can I Get Sold Out Tickets or Discounted Tickets to Mariah Carey’s 2024 Christmas Tour?

Once tickets to Mariah Carey’s Christmas tour go on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Are Mariah Carey’s 2024 Christmas Tour Dates?

See the dates for “Mariah Carey’s Christmas Time” tour below, and get tickets here.

11/06 – Highland, California @ Yaamava Theater
11/08 – Los Angeles, California @ Hollywood Bowl
11/13 – Greater Palm Springs, California @ Acrisure Arena
11/15 – Phoenix, Arizona @ Footprint Center
11/17 – Austin, Texas @ Moody Center
11/19 – Houston, Texas @ Toyota Center
11/21 – Dallas, Texas @ American Airlines Center
11/23 – Atlanta, Georgia @ State Farm Arena
11/25 – Nashville, Tennessee @ Bridgestone Arena
11/27 – Rosemont, Illinois @ Allstate Arena
11/29 – St. Louis, Missouri @ Enterprise Center
12/01 – Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena
12/03 – Philadelphia, Pennsylvania @ Wells Fargo Center
12/05 – Boston, Massachusetts @ TD Garden
12/07 – Baltimore, Maryland @ CFG Bank Arena
12/09 – Raleigh, North Carolina @ PNC Arena
12/11 – Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania @ PPG Paints Arena
12/13 – Newark, New Jersey @ Prudential Center
12/15 – Belmont Park, New York @ UBS Arena
12/17 – Brooklyn, New York @ Barclays Center

Does Mariah Carey Have Any Other Upcoming Tour Dates?

Mariah Carey recently added new dates to her Las Vegas residency, “The Celebration of Mimi Live in Las Vegas,” extending it into early 2025. A celebration of her 2005 album, The Emancipation of Mimi, the residency takes place at the Dolby Live at Park MGM from July 26th – August 10th, 2024, and January 31st – February 15th, 2025. Tickets can be purchased here.
